article.description: Zachary Hamilton scored 23 points and Prairie View A&M picked up its first victory of the season, beating Eastern Kentucky 80-70 at the MGM Main Event tournament on Monday.
article.headline: Hamilton leads Prairie View to first win of season, 80-70
article.linkText: Hamilton leads Prairie View to first win of season, 80-70
article.story: LAS VEGAS -- Zachary Hamilton scored 23 points and Prairie View A&M picked up its first victory of the season, beating Eastern Kentucky 80-70 at the MGM Main Event tournament on Monday. Hamilton was 8-of-16 shooting and made three 3-pointers for the Panthers (1-3), who came in winless after a challenging string of games against Oregon, UNLV and Utah. Gary Blackston added 19 points and five assists and Dennis Jones 14 points. Nick Mayo was 7-of-9 shooting and made 9 of 10 free throws in scoring 25 points for the Colonels (2-2). Deandre Dishman added 13 points. Hamilton scored the first six points of the game and the Panthers never trailed, leading 39-29 at halftime. The Colonels opened the second half by scoring the first six points to cut their deficit to four, but wouldn't get closer. The Colonels were within six with four minutes left but a 10-2 Panthers run sealed the outcome. The Panthers scored 27 points off 19 turnovers. Prairie View advances to the championship game of the "Middleweight Bracket" on Wednesday with Georgia Southern playing for third place.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
